alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Macon; Peach; Taylor (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 13 at 6:27AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Macon, southwestern Peach, south central Crawford and southeastern Taylor Counties through 645 AM EDT... At 627 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Potterville, or near Butler, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Fort Valley, Montezuma, Marshallville, Reynolds, Ideal, Saint Louis, Whitewater State Park, Nakomis, Garden Valley, Hicks, Potterville, Winchester and Bartlett. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
